name: campaign_monthly_metrics
description:
Aggregates campaign performance metrics by company and month.
This model provides a time-based view of campaign effectiveness for each company,
calculating key metrics, total spend/revenue, and month-over-month percentage changes.
It facilitates company-specific performance tracking, seasonal analysis, and trend visualization.

columns.name: Company
columns.description: The name of the company associated with the campaign metrics.

columns.name: month
columns.description: The calendar month (1-12) for which the metrics are aggregated.

columns.name: campaign_count
columns.description: Total number of campaigns run by the company during the month.

columns.name: avg_conversion_rate
columns.description: Average conversion rate across all campaigns for the company in the month (e.g., 0.08 for 8%).

columns.name: avg_roi
columns.description: Average Return on Investment (ROI) across all campaigns for the company in the month.

columns.name: avg_acquisition_cost
columns.description: Average cost to acquire a customer or achieve a conversion goal across all campaigns for the company in the month.

columns.name: avg_ctr
columns.description: Average Click-Through Rate (CTR) across all campaigns for the company in the month (e.g., 0.32 for 32%).

columns.name: total_clicks
columns.description: Total number of clicks generated by the company's campaigns during the month.

columns.name: total_impressions
columns.description: Total number of impressions served by the company's campaigns during the month.

columns.name: total_spend
columns.description: Total advertising spend by the company during the month. Calculated as the sum of Acquisition_Cost from campaigns.

columns.name: total_revenue
columns.description: Estimated total revenue generated by the company's campaigns during the month, calculated as total_spend * avg_roi.

columns.name: roi_vs_prev_month
columns.description: Percentage change in average ROI compared to the previous month for the company. Null for the first available month of data for each company.

columns.name: conversion_rate_vs_prev_month
columns.description: Percentage change in average conversion rate compared to the previous month for the company. Null for the first available month of data for each company.

columns.name: acquisition_cost_vs_prev_month
columns.description: Percentage change in average acquisition cost compared to the previous month for the company (positive value indicates improvement/lower cost). Null for the first available month of data for each company.

columns.name: ctr_vs_prev_month
columns.description: Percentage change in average CTR compared to the previous month for the company. Null for the first available month of data for each company.
